subject: Subject
aboutMe.description: Personal page where you can find different information about me, including: abstract, academic background, professional experience, technical skills, personal projects and contacts.
wonGames.description: Game store which offers the possibility to add them to the wishlist, buy them via credit card and enjoy great deals. All content is managed by a CMS.
myTrips.description: Interactive world map with some points of interest: hometown, visited countries and places to visit.
blog.description: A blog that reads and understand Markdown files, creating pages automatically from the content of those files.
boilerplateJS.description: Boilerplate to create projects with JavaScript, Next.js, styled-components and Jest.
boilerplateTS.description: Boilerplate to create projects with TypeScript, Next.js, styled-components and Jest.
